snippet.title: Lix the Luckless Lizard comes up short [Halls gameplay Video]
snippet.description:
Lix has a lot to be confident about; he's near untouchable and he constantly rocks out behind his Shield. But what can he do when a Mimic insults his jams and steals all his Shield-giving battery?

Wishlist or join Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422190/Fuzz_Force_Spook_Squad/

Fuzz Force: Spook Squad is a fresh take on the deckbuilding genre. Customise your Dice-Powered weapons to defeat an legion of spooky foes. Navigate a board game world full of battles and treasure with the mission of capturing the nefarious PolterPrince.
